p: The effect of T. mastichina essential oil was evaluated on several bacteria of the Enterobacteriaceae family ( E. coli, Salmonella spp.) with an origin in poultry and pigs species, was registered with MIC values with 4% ( v/ v) [ 29], as well as in other studies against methicillin-sensitive S. aureus and S. epidermidis isolates from ovine mastitic milk [ 48].
